import React, { Component } from "react"; import Form from "./macroComponents/form/form"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Joi = require("joi-browser"); class LoginForm extends Form { state = { formData: { email: "", password: "", }, errors: {}, }; schema = { email: Joi.string() .required() .email({ tlds: { allow: false } }), password: Joi.string().required().min(8), }; doSubmit = () => { //call the server console.log("submitted"); }; render() { return (

Welcome back!

Please sign in to continue.
{this.renderInput("email", "Email")} {this.renderInput( "password", "Password", "password" )} {this.renderButton("Sign In")}

Forgot password?

Don't have an account? Create an Account

); } } export default LoginForm;
